title: Strategy, script, and structure
summary: We align on audience, value prop, and outcomes. Then we script the narrative, sitemap, and section outline.
outputs: Site map and prioritized page list

title: Design direction and system
summary: We define the visual language—type scale, color, grids, and motion DNA—so every section feels cohesive.

title: Key pages — round 1
summary: Design and build the highest‑impact pages in parallel: hero, proof, product storytelling, and CTA surfaces.

title: Key pages — round 2
summary: Finish core pages and long‑form sections. Wire real copy. Start CMS and content model if needed.
outputs: Deep dive or case study structure

title: Motion, QA, and polish
summary: We refine micro‑interactions, accessibility, keyboard flows, and states. Performance budget enforced.

title: Integrations and content
summary: Analytics, forms, and SEO metadata wired. Add real content, images, and domain/OG card previews.

title: Launch and handoff
summary: Go‑live on Vercel, DNS, and cache warmup. Handoff with loom walkthrough, edit guide, and next‑sprint plan.
